Chris Boswell

Christopher Lynn Boswell  (The Wizard of Boz)

Position: K Throws: Right

6-2, 185lb (188cm, 83kg)

Team: Pittsburgh Steelers

Born: March 16, 1991 in Fort Worth, TX

College: Rice  (College Stats)

Weighted Career AV (100-95-...): 32 (3664th overall since 1960)

High School: Fossil Ridge (TX)

  • 2x Pro Bowl
  • 1x All-Pro

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Chris Boswell?

Chris Boswell is 34 years old.

When was Chris Boswell born?

Chris Boswell was born on March 16, 1991.

Where was Chris Boswell born?

Chris Boswell was born in Fort Worth, TX.

How tall is Chris Boswell?

Chris Boswell is 6-2 (188 cm) tall.

How much does Chris Boswell weigh?

Chris Boswell weighs 185 lbs (83 kg).

How many games does Chris Boswell play?

Chris Boswell played 17 games last season and 167 games over his career.

How many Super Bowls has Chris Boswell won?

Chris Boswell has never won a Super Bowl.

What are Chris Boswell's nicknames?

The Wizard of Boz is a nickname for Chris Boswell.
